description.name: usdterc20
description.tagline: USDT erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-usdt Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept USDT erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/usdt receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/usdt wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
